sentences: Lola Djangi Chécain, (18 August 1942 - 10 August 1992)  was a soukous recording artist, composer, and vocalist in the Democratic Republic of the Congo.
He was once a member of the soukous band TPOK Jazz, led by François Luambo Makiadi, which dominated the Congolese music scene from the 1950s to the 1980s.
